description: During my professional experience, I worked on the development and maintenance of digital products for Autodoc EVA and CONAZ, using the agile methodology KANBAN. I also developed scripts to automate operations within the systems, aiming to increase the efficiency and productivity of the team.

I developed and implemented systems, provided support, and maintained the GOVERNA and SINC systems for the Coordenação Geral de Soluções Tecnológicas (CGST), a unit of Casa Civil. During the process, I used the agile methodology SCRUM to ensure efficient and high-quality delivery.

At the Municipal Education Department of Goianésia, I was responsible for providing technical support to the institution's employees, assisting with issues related to hardware, software, and computer networks. In addition, I provided technical support to the city's municipal schools.
